casebody.data:
No. 10A393. Michael Bowersox, Applicant v. Roderick Nunley. 562 U.S. 996, 131 S. Ct. 444,

178 L. Ed. 2d 345,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8325. October 19, 2010.

Application to vacate the stay of execution of sentence of death, entered by the United States District Court for the Western District of Missouri on October 18, 2010, presented to Justice Alito, and by him referred to the Court, denied.

*346Justice Scalia would grant the application to vacate the stay of execution.
